Articles.Content:
I want to delete a part from a ship in orbit. I have lots of ships with ISA mapsat. And I want to delete de mod whithout loosing my ships.

I tryed to replace the mod parts whith stock parts in the persistent file and asingn the same parent number. But this makes a caos and bugs the ships.

Is there a way to delete the mod without loosing my ships?

Tnks

Edited October 4, 2013 by trulala
Well, you could rendezvous and have a kerbal knock off the mod part,
press f12 and hit the whack a Kerbal, quicksave and try to gently nudge it off.
Goldham has the right idea! Very kerbal!

You could edit the config for the part to make it act like a decoupler, then just jettison it from the craft. As to how that's done? No idea, but I'm sure it's possible to make it behave like a different part.

I would just edit the CFG file for the mapsat part. Remove or comment out the module that actually loads the mapsat code. This will make all the mapsat parts non-functional, essentially turning them into decorative dead weight. And you can easily change it back if mapsat is ever fixed.

You should just be able to remove all the mod files, including in some cases the part files, from your KSP install without doing any damage at all to a craft simply by deleting them from the respective folders. That is of course assuming the parts involved aren't required to keep the rocket in one piece, but that shouldn't be a problem here.

Works fine for MechJeb and KER.

If there's a mod part on a craft, deleting the mod (or even just the part!) will cause the craft to be removed from the game. That's why the OP wants a way to remove the part from the craft.

I think nhnifong's idea is the best solution I've heard so far.

I would just edit the CFG file for the mapsat part. Remove or comment out the module that actually loads the mapsat code. This will make all the mapsat parts non-functional, essentially turning them into decorative dead weight. And you can easily change it back if mapsat is ever fixed.

To disable it only for a single craft, you can also create a copy of the part.cfg, rename the part, rename it in your save file, and remove all MODULEs from the new part.cfg.

I think I will recreate the ships without MapSat and hyper edit them to where they were

tnks
